name: proffering
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
proffer
to offer something by holding it out, or to offer advice or an opinion: He shook the warmly proffered hand. I didn't think it wise to proffer an opinion. Synonyms
extend (OFFER) formal
offer
